text: On 22 December 2018, a tsunami that was caused by an eruption and collapse of the Anak Krakatau volcano in the Sunda Strait struck coastal regions of Banten and Lampung, Indonesia. At least 281 people were killed and 1,016 were injured. According to The Guardian, "the tsunami is believed to have been caused by undersea landslides that followed an eruption of the Anak Krakatau volcano". ==References== Category:December 2018 events Category:2018 disasters in Indonesia Category:2018 earthquakes Category:Earthquakes in Indonesia Category:2010s tsunamis
title: 2018 Sunda Strait tsunami
